Headline: #92 Foster Temporary Reroute at Foster/Kimball
ShortDescription: 92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Pulaski, Bryn Mawr and Kedzie: due to, street blockage near Foster/Kimball.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Pulaski, Bryn Mawr and Kedzie: due to, street blockage near Foster/Kimball.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/15th
ShortDescription: 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, 16th, Kostner, Roosevelt, and Pulaski due to, street blockage at Pulaski/15th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Pulaski, 16th, Kostner, Roosevelt, and Pulaski due to, street blockage at Pulaski/15th.

Allow extra travel time.
